segments.text: Hey , Robert , that's a nice shirt you are wearing . Where did you get it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , I like it too . I bought it at the nearby department store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's nice . Do you know you can get one at the wholesale market near the zoo for a much lower price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I know that . But at those places . the prices they ask you are ridiculously high , and if you don't bargain hard , you will get ripped-off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True , learning how to haggle the price is one of the things people have to pick up when they come to China for the first time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but personally I hate bargaining . If I bargain , I might come to a lower price . But I will never know the true price of what I am buying , and I'll always have the feeling that I am over charged at those places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I have the same feeling . Also there is another thing that bothers me the quality . Things in a department store are usually quality-guaranteed . But at a wholesale market , you never know whether what you are buying are of good quality or not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why I like department stores more . Shopping at a wholesale market like the locals is one of the few things I am unable to grow accustomed to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . While it's always good to follow the local customs , I guess there are exceptions .
segments.speaker: S1
